paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses the V30M mutation in the TTR gene, its implications in amyloidosis, and provides some insights into penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: V30M-TTR fibrils, one of the more than 80 identified mutations on TTR as causative gene abnormality in FAP.

functional_data.summary: The V30M mutation leads to the formation of amyloid fibrils.

variants.segregation_data: The V30M mutation is known to segregate with familial amyloid polyneuropathy.
variants.additional_notes: The paper emphasizes the pathogenic nature of the V30M mutation in TTR.
key_quotes: V30M-TTR fibrils, one of the more than 80 identified mutations on TTR as causative gene abnormality in FAP.

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as the paper provided clear information regarding the TTR variant.
